DOC.brief_summary: This study build Chinese national registry surveillance system acute myocardial infarction ( AMI ) obtain real-world information current status characteristic , risk factor , diagnosis , treatment outcome Chinese AMI patient ; And propose scientific precaution strategy aim prevent effectively incidence AMI ; And optimize management outcome AMI patient implementation guideline recommendation clinical practice , analysis development effective treatment strategy ; And create cost-effective assessment system .
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study establish national platform surveillance , clinical research translational medicine China , design facilitate effort improve quality AMI patient care thus decrease morbidity mortality associate AMI .
DOC.criteria: Eligible patient must admit within 7 day acute ischemic symptom diagnose acute STelevation non STelevation myocardial infarction . Diagnosis criterion must meet Universal Definition AMI ( 2012 ) . All participate hospital require enroll consecutive patient AMI . Myocardial infarction relate percutaneous coronary intervention coronary artery bypass grafting .
